participant_1.background:
I spend my free time with my new love, whom I love to drive around with on long winding roads.
I started writing and recording blues music in my spare time.
i do not like pickles.
i am blind.
i am from tennessee.

participant_2.background:
I make sure my kids are taken care of before I spend time doing what I enjoy.
i love all of my beautiful children.
I've started to write short stories in my spare time.
i have a little sister.
I take care of myself physically and mentally.

content.text: Hey, what do you enjoy doing in your spare time?
I love writing short stories in my spare time!
That's so cool! I've actually been thinking about starting to write blues music in my spare time.
That would be awesome! I love music, so I would definitely be interested in hearing it.
Thanks! I think I'm going to start by recording some demos with my phone, and then I'll see if I can get any of them published.
That's a great idea! I'm sure you'll be able to get them published if you keep working hard on them.
Thanks for the encouragement! I'm definitely going to keep working on them.
No problem! I'm always happy to help people achieve their goals.
You're awesome! Thanks again for talking to me.
You're welcome! It was my pleasure.
